long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is designed with the user experience of Instagram and Threads as a top priority. Utilize powerful AI technology to automatically generate insightful comments and save time while increasing touchpoints with multiple potential customers. This automatic comment bot makes your activities on Instagram and Threads more efficient.

Key Features

Automatic Comment Generation: Increase user interaction with insightful comments generated by AI.

Follow Management: Easily identify users who do not follow you back and automatically remove them to keep your account tidy.

Time-Saving: Escape the hassle of manually commenting and managing followers.

Why Do You Need AI Comments?

Leave a lasting impression with sophisticated comments:
âœ… Impressive

âœ… Authentic

âœ… Insightful

âœ… Relevant

Stop wasting time with simple comments:
âŒ "Great post!"

âŒ "Thanks for sharing!"

âŒ "ğŸ‘"

How to Use the App

Enter your Instagram or Threads ID.

Input the number of comments to post or the number of followers to remove, then press the button and just wait.

Frequently Asked Questions

â“ Can the AI generate comments in languages other than English?

Yes, it supports all languages. Here are the top 20 most used languages:

American English
British English
German
French
Spanish
Italian
ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡ (Simplified Chinese)
à¤¹à¤¿à¤¨à¥à¤¦à¥€ (Hindi)
Arabic
Bengali
Russian
Portuguese
Indonesian
Urdu
Japanese
Punjabi
Javanese
Telugu
Turkish
Korean
â“ Does commenting increase reach?

ğŸš€ Yes, indeed! Engage in conversations and leave meaningful comments on Instagram and Threads. More people will pay attention to your content.

â“ What effect does commenting have?

ğŸš€ Posting comments on Instagram and Threads is not only delivered to the original author and their network, but also visible to a broader audience. Enhance engagement and build relationships through meaningful discussions.

â“ Are comments better than likes?

ğŸš€ If you want to stand out on Instagram and Threads, comments are key. They help attract the attention of others and keep the conversation going.

â“ How does the automatic comment bot work?

ğŸš€ This bot generates high-quality comments simply by entering the URL of the lead's Instagram or Threads post.

â“ How often should I comment each day?

ğŸš€ Itâ€™s ideal to post comments on 5 posts each day.

Now, engage with more potential customers through the automatic comment bot on Instagram and Threads. Comment to increase your engagement and enjoy more benefits!

Disclaimer: This app is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed, or officially connected to Instagram or Threads in any way.

Changes:

v1.1.7 - 01.03.2025

Fixed a bug that prevented the discovery of new content.

Resolved issues to ensure consistent operation across all language versions.

Added a feature to offer a one-week premium version upon registration.

Improved the stability of the automatic follower increase feature.

v1.1.6 - 01.03.2025

I implemented a feature to automatically increase followers by sending follow requests to the followers of neighboring users and by liking and commenting automatically.

I modified the automatic comment results to remain persistent and added the ability to reset them whenever needed.

Fixed an issue where the comment result ID URL did not work when performing tasks in other tabs.

v1.1.5 - 11.11.2024

I fixed the Instagram auto-comment feature, which was not working, so it is now operational again.

In the Instagram commenting section, I made it so that my comments are excluded from the reply ID list.

For usability improvements, I changed the AI for the Instagram auto-comment feature from the ChatGPT API to the Gemini API.

v1.1.4 - 04.11.2024

Reply Account Detection: If the account is identified as a reply account, it will now skip without indicating that there is no new content. To identify reply accounts, if the profile contains the @username, the extension will navigate to that link.

Improved Example Comments: Fixed the issue where example comments appeared unnatural or were generated in batches of five at once. Adjustments have been made to the GPT prompt for better comment generation.

v1.1.3 - 01.11.2024

Auto Like After Commenting: The feature has been updated to automatically like your post after you write a comment.

Post Navigation Feature Added: A new feature has been added to allow users to flexibly set the number of comments or posts to navigate through.

Move to Next Post if No Comments: Improved to automatically move to the next post if there are no comments displayed by the Instagram comment bot.

Fixed Interval Between Likes and Comments: The interval between liking and commenting has been fixed to 1 second for a more consistent workflow.

Maintain Progress in Tabs: Changed to allow continuous progress within the same tab, enhancing user experience even when working in other tabs.
